Sex Tips.title: Communication is Key
Sex Tips.summary: Talking openly about your desires and boundaries is the foundation of a healthy sex life. Start with small, positive affirmations.

Safe Sex.title: The Importance of Regular Testing
Safe Sex.summary: Regular STI screenings are a normal part of healthcare. It's an act of care for yourself and your partner.

Reproductive Health.title: Understanding Your Cycle
Reproductive Health.summary: Tracking your cycle can help you understand your energy levels, moods, and overall health beyond just fertility.

Orgasm & Pleasure.title: Exploring Sensate Focus
Orgasm & Pleasure.summary: Sensate focus exercises help you focus on physical sensations without the pressure of performance or reaching a specific goal.

Latest News.title: New Trends in Wellness
Latest News.summary: Recent studies show that shared mindfulness practices can significantly improve relationship satisfaction over time.

Common Worries.title: Navigating Low Libido
Common Worries.summary: Libido fluctuations are normal and can be affected by stress, fatigue, or hormonal changes. Patience and empathy are essential.

Let's Talk.title: Active Listening in Relationships
Let's Talk.summary: Try the 'speaker-listener' technique: one person speaks while the other summarizes what they heard before responding.
